I stopped the crawl finally...and the IO is still busy! I waited for a 
few minutes and it remains the same.

Once I shutdown heritrix. It all comes back to normal. No more busy IO.

I've had -Xmx1500m on 1.0.4 before. It never gives me this kind of IO 
rates. In fact the most I got from 1.0.4 was around 10-20% IO.

Is there any one out there seeing heavy IO when running 1.4? 

Thanks,

-joe
